org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.handler.RecipientHandler

  • Packages that use RecipientHandler 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp
    SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.handler
    SMTP server handler interfaces.

      class  LocalDeliveryHandler
      SMTP handler that delivers incoming messages to local mailboxes.
      class  SimpleRelayHandler
      A simple SMTP relay handler that accepts messages and forwards them.
